metadata.synopsis: One-liner for Ermlaut, Civilian1 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the civilian1 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

0.speaker: Ermlaut
0.text: I guess there are other uses for magic besides fighting off invading cultists. But I wonder if these mages shouldn't be in the battle.

1.speaker: Ermlaut
1.text: You. There are children here - and from what I've read, I don't think you should be around them.

2.speaker: Ermlaut
2.text: Used to be like this all the time - before the Absolute. From what I hear, thanks to people like you, maybe we'll get back to that.
